channel.title: New monitor
channel.description:
I just bought a new monitor, looks pretty awesome, especially for the price. I'm wondering if anyone else here owns a Hanns-G monitor. The specs on it are really nice. 21.5in, 1080p, etc. I plan on using it as a secondary PC monitor, and a lcd for my 360. If you know anything about the sound quality they have, that information would be nice too.
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16824254039

item.title: New monitor
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

Don’t expect much from the speakers at all, expect the menu buttons on the monitor to annoy you.

Read full topic
